ProjectTitle: Optimization of low dose CT for lung cancer screening: finding the  best balance between radiation risk and performance in terms of  image quality and success rate of computer aided detection
InitialFeedbackHistory:
17/06/2022
3. Ethics, please list your privacy and ethics approval numbers in your final DMP that you submit to FWO at the end of the project, it is recommend to update your DMP upon approval and check if other sections such storage and preservation need to be changed. Keep in mind that the ethics committee UZL recommends preservation of data for 25 years. You can submit this updated DMP as intermediate. 
7. Sharing: you can mention personal data as a factor restricting sharing. Are there any European domain specific repositories where you can deposit your data under restricted access, if not you can consider using KU Leuven RDR: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
label: good with suggestions
